## stopMiddlewares

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/app/interrupt/signals.ts" sourceLine="12" packageName="commandkit" />

Stop upcoming middleware and command execution.
This will **not** stop any `after()` callbacks inside the command.

```ts title="Signature"
function stopMiddlewares(): never
```
